message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your product, but I'm hoping to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling it to me for $120?

Hi Bob, I understand you're on a budget, but I need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I can offer it to you for $140. This is my best price, and I'm confident you'll love the product!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I still feel that $120 would be a fair price for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
